entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • NullRef in AbstractSyncNamespaceCodeRefactoringProvider.State.cs#L161 #60270

Closed

  • Severe Performance Issues with Roslyn Background Analysis Service #59766
    17.2
  • 'await using' errors if IAsyncDisposable is not defined even though it works on types that don't implement IAsyncDisposable #45111
    17.2

PullRequests

Created

  • Assert window title before closing #60277
    Area-IDE
  • Ban incompatible service provider extension methods #60276
    Area-IDE
  • Remove outdated comment #60275
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Fix top-level speculation #60274
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Check for reference assembly before deciding which language to show #60271
    Area-IDE
  • Add syntax normalizer tests for UTF8 String Literals. #60269
    Area-IDE, Area-Compilers, New Feature - Utf8StringLiterals

Merged

  • Remove Name property, make NotificationOption immutable #60245
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Only report missing disposal interfaces if used #60252
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Update ToImmutableArrayAsync to work with all cancellation patterns #60050
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Move CSharpDiagnosticAnalyzerQuickInfoProvider to EditorFeature #60266
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to features/semi-auto-props #60280
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Move more package initialization to BG. #60211
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.3 #60247
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Initial sketch of exposing imports from the semantic model #59533
    Area-Compilers, api-ready-for-review
  • Implement QuickInfo for UTF8 String Literals #60268
    Area-IDE, Area-Compilers, New Feature - Utf8StringLiterals
  • Implement classification for UTF8 String Literals #60265
    Area-IDE, Area-Compilers, New Feature - Utf8StringLiterals
  • Add F1HelpTests for `checked` keyword. #60258
    Area-IDE, Area-Compilers, New Feature - CheckedUserDefinedOperators
